Deep Learning System Design
1. Multimodal Neural Network Architecture
Image Processing Subnetwork
- Input: 224 x 224 x 3
- Conv Layer 1: 64 filters, 3x3, ReLU
- Max Pooling 1: 2x2
- Conv Layer 2: 128 filters, 3x3, ReLU
- Max Pooling 2: 2x2
- Conv Layer 3: 256 filters, 3x3, ReLU
- Max Pooling 3: 2x2
- FC Layer 1: 1024 units, ReLU
- FC Layer 2: 512 units, ReLU
- Output: 256 features
Audio Processing Subnetwork
- Input: 128 x 128 x 1
- Conv Layer 1: 64 filters, 3x3, ReLU
- Max Pooling 1: 2x2
- Conv Layer 2: 128 filters, 3x3, ReLU
- Max Pooling 2: 2x2
- Conv Layer 3: 256 filters, 3x3, ReLU
- Max Pooling 3: 2x2
- FC Layer 1: 1024 units, ReLU
- FC Layer 2: 512 units, ReLU
- Output: 256 features
Text Processing Subnetwork
- Input: Text sequence (max length 100)
- Embedding Layer: 300 dimensions
- LSTM Layer 1: 256 units, tanh
- LSTM Layer 2: 256 units, tanh
- FC Layer: 512 units, ReLU
- Output: 256 features
Fusion Layer
- Concatenate features: 768 dimensions
- FC Layer 1: 512 units, ReLU
- FC Layer 2: 256 units, ReLU
- Output: 256 features
2. Training and Optimization
- Loss Function: Cross-Entropy Loss
- Optimizer: Adam (lr=0.001, beta1=0.9, beta2=0.999, epsilon=1e-08)
- Regularization: Dropout (rate=0.5)
3. Real-time Data Stream Processing and Model Inference
- Data Stream Platform: Apache Kafka/Flink
- Model Optimization: Quantization, Pruning
- Hardware Acceleration: GPU/TPU
- Parallel and Batch Processing
4. Automated Decision Module
- Rule Engine: Predefined rules for common scenarios
- Neural Network: FC Layer 1 (128 units, ReLU), FC Layer 2 (64 units, ReLU), Output (1 unit, Sigmoid)
- Decision Fusion: Weighted average or logical combination
- Action Execution: Trigger alarms, send notifications, initiate emergency plans
